review: Been playing it for years. Great game

so im not a pvp game player, never liked it, i heard back when overwatch 1 came out that it was going to include a pve mode, it didnt i still played it anyway with hopes of one, come 4 years later ow2 is announced with pve going to be a central focus. where is that now? no where. gone reduced to hopes in developers heads for a company that will never allow real creativity over cost.
sucks on blizzard.net sucks on steam

[h1]I'm too far gone, but if you are looking for a recommendation on whether get the game or not [i]DO NOT DO THIS TO YOURSELF[/i].[/h1]

It's really fucking funny how these assholes had the opportunity to create one of the best multiplayer games but they decided that money is more important than their playerbase, asking to pay 20 dollars for a skin that used to be free. And then they have the vein to say "Oh, remember this promise we made 3 years ago? Yeah, not happening anymore (KEK)"

I've been playing this shit since release and I can say one thing: Both game and company went to shit after [url=https://youtu.be/RMDItOwN_SU]Jeff Kaplan[/url] dipped. And honestly? I'm happy for him. 

Anyways, run away while you still can.

Overwatch 2 is equivalent to the final season of Game Of Throne. Overwatch 2 devs are made of people who are incompetent at their jobs. They say they gave up, PVE, RPG, Hero mission, talent tree, and repayable story mode, in order to work on PVP.

However, Overwatch 2 PVP content is worse than Overwatch 1. They simply do not know how to fix bugs, and they take few weeks to fix game breaking bugs. It used to fixed within few days, now it takes 7 times more, and they claim double the staff.

Furthermore, Overwatch 2 devs only know how to buff the heroes, and nerf it down next season when that hero became meta. It literally takes an entire season to balance the game per hero. Two season ago, Junker queen got buff, so everyone plays Junker queen, last season, they nerf down, so nobody plays Junker queen, and they buffed Solider 76, and everybody played Solider 76, because he became OP. Now they just nerfed Solider 76. That is not balancing.

Overwatch 2 PVP is straight up, downgrade compare to Overwatch 1. Bobby Kotick shove his entire body into Overwatch devs to make this game worse and unplayable. At this point, I endorse bullying Bobby Kotickâ€™s children. This game is beyond disrespect compare to Overwatch 1 is.

They also hold all cancellation content to the last minutes, so the fans spend the money on this game and lying to them in their faces. Devs say they will be more open to communicate with the fans, but it does not work when the entire game reason for needing a sequel is gone. 

Overwatch 1 is the game I spend most hours on, beside Minecraft. I just do not understand why they even remove Overwatch 1 that now, it is completely gone.

Let me get this out the way now, OW1 is better than OW2. However, I do think they are making steps in the right direction to improve the game. With this latest update, I'm impressed with what they have done. The game feels fresh after not playing for a few months. How long will it last though? I'm not for sure. I plan on buying the story missions to try that out (should be free) so I'll see how fun that is. I wish there was a meh because that's what this game needs. I see a lot of people on here getting on for achievements, not playing it then leaving a review because of the last time they played it. I'm not going to do that as all games deserve a second chance in my opinion
Por fin puedo desinstalar el battlenet de mrd <3
